channel.title: Disconecting problem
channel.description:
Hello,
I am having some problems.
After a while Axoloti disconets from software saying:
LINK BIN Done compiling patch Start uploading patch bin path: /Users/aturuxo/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.bin block uploaded @ 0x20011000 length 32768 block uploaded @ 0x20019000 length 148 Done uploading patch Starting patch... Done starting patch Start locking Done locking Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now Disconnect request
Some idea?
Thanks

item.title: Disconecting problem
item.dc:creator: @xoanxil xoanxil
item.description:
@xoanxil wrote:

Thanks for your answers. Finally I delete an object and it looks like is stable again.

I was afraid was a hardware problem.

All the best,

x.x

Read full topic

item.title: Disconecting problem
item.dc:creator: @SirSickSik Remco
item.description:
@SirSickSik wrote:

I have this too sometimes. I think it has to do with the fact that I'm sending both the axoloti and the receiver of a wireless mouse though an old hub I still had laying around, perhaps it's too much for my computer, which doesn't have an awesome processor, b√∫t also features a huge ass touchscreen..
This might make the communication go too slow and out of sync somehow.

Read full topic

item.title: Disconecting problem
item.dc:creator: @SmashedTransistors
item.description:
@SmashedTransistors wrote:

can you post your patch so that i, or somebody else, can try it ?

Read full topic

item.title: Disconecting problem

item.description:
@xoanxil wrote:

Hello,

I am having some problems.

After a while Axoloti disconets from software saying:

LINK
BIN
Done compiling patch
Start uploading patch
bin path: /Users/aturuxo/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.bin
block uploaded @ 0x20011000 length 32768
block uploaded @ 0x20019000 length 148

Disconnect request
